notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.
ariaShowSolution: Show the solution. You will be provided with a sample solution.

taskDescription: On June 9, 2021, 1 U.S. dollar was worth 1.21 Canadian dollars. Write this comparison as a ratio.
detailedSolution:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>a</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">a</annotation></semantics></math> = 1 U.S. dollar, and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>b</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">b</annotation></semantics></math> = 1.21 Canadian dollars, the ratio is 1 to 1.21; or 1:1.21; or <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mfrac>
    <mn>1</mn>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mn>1.21</mn>
    </mrow>
  </mfrac>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\frac{1}{{1.21}}</annotation></semantics></math> .
